EmailTemplate.name: Thank You After Final Interview
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You - {!Opportunity.Name} Final Interview
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Contact.FirstName},
I wanted to express my sincere gratitude for the opportunity to complete the final interview for the {!Opportunity.Name} position at {!Opportunity.Account.Name}.
Meeting with the team and learning more about the company culture, vision, and objectives has only strengthened my enthusiasm for this opportunity. I am genuinely excited about the prospect of joining your organization and contributing to your continued success.
I believe my skills, experience, and passion for Salesforce make me an excellent fit for this role, and I'm eager to bring my expertise to your team.
Thank you again for your time, consideration, and the thorough interview process. I look forward to hearing your decision.
Best regards, Abby Luggery {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
